page.title: 16Children's building toys
page.content: Lego is a very popular constructional toy.It consists of little bricks,of various colours,shapes and sizes,and many other interconnecting pieces,with which to make models. In Denmark there is a Legoland which has large models some of them being lifesize. I have quite a bit of Lego,and some of it is the technical variety.The latter has special bricks which can take cogs and gears. With this type of lego you can make gears work,gears are small cogs and big cogs joined together in a mechanical way. With lego you always receive sets of instructions,but the best thing about it is that you can make things that the instructions do not show and often these can be quite good.
